body_html:
Unfortunately, we stopped Mac GPU support after the 1.1 release. The build itself is broken as well and we have disabled it. We are accepting patches for Mac GPU, but no longer offer any official support. Sorry about that.

As for the links in the README, thanks for pointing that out! I've created a PR: #11790

As for the links in the README, thanks for pointing that out! I've created a PR: #11790
body:
Unfortunately, we stopped Mac GPU support after the 1.1 release. The build itself is broken as well and we have disabled it. We are accepting patches for Mac GPU, but no longer offer any official support. Sorry about that.

As for the links in the README, thanks for pointing that out! I've created a PR: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/11790
